overview:
Chris George is the SVP of Integrated Marketing and Sales at BuzzMedia. He previously worked at MySpace as the VP of Integrated Marketing.

A web solutions and marketing expert, George spent close to four years at MySpace culminating to VP, Integrated Marketing. While there, he developed the companyâ€™s monetization strategy and was instrumental in launching a full suite of advertising products.

George has also held management positions at IGN Entertainment where he oversaw advertising products, sales development and market intelligence, and at FCB in San Francisco where he led accounts for clients such as Hewlett-Packard, SEGA, Palm and LucasArts into the emerging world of digital marketing.

He holds a BA degree in Advertising from Michigan State University.
